<title level="1" right="Rules">[Fine Living (4th)](/Rules.aspx?ID=1767)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 513

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Your people celebrate your leadership by indulging you with feasts and finery. All PCs associated with the kingdom enjoy a [Fine standard of living](/Rules.aspx?ID=253) at no cost whenever they're in the kingdom. Any PCs in hostile wilderness, a monster-filled dungeon, or otherwise cut off from their citizens must provide their own sustenance as usual even if they are within the boundaries of their kingdom.

 You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all checks made to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) or [Earn Income](/Actions.aspx?ID=23) while in your kingdom.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
